Installation Instructions:

  1. Download the extension ZIP file using the button below
  2. Open Chrome and navigate to chrome://extensions/
  3. Enable "Developer mode" in the top right corner
  4. Drag and drop the downloaded ZIP file onto the extensions page, OR
  5. Click "Load unpacked" and select the extracted extension folder
  6. The MCP Browser extension should appear in your extensions list
  7. Refresh this page to verify the connection
